import React,{createRef, useRef} from 'react' const AddMenus = () => { let nombreIngrediente=useRef(null) function regresar(){ //window.location.assign("http://192.168.1.4:3000/Menus"); } async function crear(evento){ alert("hola mundo") } async function añadiringrediente(){ alert({nombreIngrediente}) } return (
{evento.preventDefault();crear(evento);}}>
) } export default AddMenus
